trans-unit.source: Specifies the possible alignments with which the items of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica las posibles alineaciones con las que se pueden mostrar los elementos de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: You control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> layout by choosing one of the members of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Puede controlar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> diseño eligiendo uno de los miembros de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> con el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Stack Layouts
trans-unit.target: Diseños de pila

trans-unit.source: Stacking is the arranging of items beside each other at both ends of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Apilar significa organizar los elementos contiguas entre sí en ambos extremos de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: The following list describes the stack layouts.
trans-unit.target: En la lista siguiente se describe los diseños de pila.

trans-unit.source: StackWithOverflow is the default.
trans-unit.target: StackWithOverflow es el valor predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: This setting causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.StackWithOverflow> to alter its layout automatically in accordance with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> property to handle dragging and docking scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Esta configuración hace que la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.StackWithOverflow> para modificar su diseño automáticamente de acuerdo con la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> propiedad controlen arrastrando y escenarios de acoplamiento.

trans-unit.source: VerticalStackWithOverflow renders the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> items beside each other vertically.
trans-unit.target: VerticalStackWithOverflow representa el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> elementos verticalmente contiguas entre sí.

trans-unit.source: HorizontalStackWithOverflow renders the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.VerticalStackWithOverflow> items beside each other horizontally.
trans-unit.target: HorizontalStackWithOverflow representa el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.VerticalStackWithOverflow> elementos horizontalmente contiguas entre sí.

trans-unit.source: Other Features of Stack Layouts
trans-unit.target: Otras características de los diseños de pila

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> determines the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.HorizontalStackWithOverflow> to which the item is aligned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> Determina el final de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.HorizontalStackWithOverflow> al que se alinea el elemento.

trans-unit.source: When items do not fit within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, an overflow button automatically appears.
trans-unit.target: Cuando los elementos no caben dentro de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, aparece automáticamente un botón de desbordamiento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property setting determines whether an item appears in the overflow area always, as needed, or never.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> configuración de la propiedad determina si un elemento aparece en el área de desbordamiento siempre, según sea necesario, o nunca.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: En el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> eventos, puede inspeccionar la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> propiedad para determinar si un elemento se colocó en el método main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>, el desbordamiento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>, o si no está actualmente visible en absoluto.

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: Los motivos típicos por qué no se muestra un elemento son que el elemento no cabía en el método main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> y su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> propiedad se estableció en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.

trans-unit.source: Make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> movable by putting it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> and setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Realizar una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> móvil colocándola un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> y estableciendo su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle>.

trans-unit.source: Other Layout Options
trans-unit.target: Otras opciones de diseño

trans-unit.source: The other layout options are Flow and Table.
trans-unit.target: Las otras opciones de diseño son flujo y la tabla.

trans-unit.source: Flow Layout
trans-unit.target: Diseño de flujo

trans-unit.source: Flow layout is the default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: Diseño de flujo es el valor predeterminado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>, y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.

trans-unit.source: It is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Es similar a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The features of Flow layout are as follows:
trans-unit.target: Las características de diseño de flujo son los siguientes:

trans-unit.source: All of the features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> are exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Todas las características de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> expuestas por la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: You must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: Debe convertir el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> clase a un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> clase.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> properties in code to align the items within the row.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> propiedades en el código para alinear los elementos dentro de la fila.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se omite la propiedad <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or did not fit.
trans-unit.target: En el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> eventos, puede inspeccionar la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> propiedad para determinar si un elemento se colocó en el método main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> o no se ajustaban.

trans-unit.source: The grip is not rendered, and therefore a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in Flow layout style in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: No se representa el control y por lo tanto, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> con el estilo de diseño de flujo en un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> no se puede mover.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> overflow button is not rendered, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> no se representa el botón de desbordamiento, y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> se omite.

trans-unit.source: Table Layout
trans-unit.target: Diseño de tabla

trans-unit.source: Table layout is the default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Diseño de la tabla es el valor predeterminado para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.

trans-unit.source: It is similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Es similar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The features of Table layout are as follows:
trans-unit.target: Las características de diseño de la tabla son los siguientes:

trans-unit.source: All of the features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> are exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Todas las características de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> expuestas por la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: You must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: Debe convertir el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> clase a un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> clase.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> properties in code to align the items within the table cell.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> propiedades en el código para alinear los elementos dentro de la celda de tabla.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se omite la propiedad <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A>.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table> or did not fit.
trans-unit.target: En el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> eventos, puede inspeccionar la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> propiedad para determinar si un elemento se colocó en el método main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table> o no se ajustaban.

trans-unit.source: The grip is not rendered, and therefore a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in Table layout style in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: No se representa el control y por lo tanto, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> con el estilo de diseño de tabla en una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> no se puede mover.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> overflow button is not rendered, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> no se representa el botón de desbordamiento, y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> se omite.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items flow horizontally or vertically as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que los elementos fluyen horizontal o verticalmente, según sea necesario.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out horizontally and overflow as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que los elementos se colocan horizontalmente y se produce un desbordamiento si es necesario.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out automatically.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que los elementos se colocan automáticamente.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out flush left.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que los elementos se alinean a la izquierda.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out vertically, are centered within the control, and overflow as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que los elementos se colocan verticalmente, se centran dentro del control y se produce un desbordamiento si es necesario.
